title: Hope
verses: Romans 15:13 (WEB) — “Now may the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, that you may abound in hope, in the power of the Holy Spirit.”
Hebrews 6:19 (WEB) — “This hope we have as an anchor of the soul, a hope both sure and steadfast…”

1 Peter 1:3 (WEB) — “Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who according to his great mercy has caused us to be born again to a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead.”
Lamentations 3:21–23 (WEB) — “This I recall to my mind; therefore I have hope… They are new every morning. Great is your faithfulness.”
Psalm 42:11 (WEB) — “Why are you in despair, my soul?… Hope in God; for I will still praise him, the salvation of my countenance and my God.”
body: Anchor your heart in Christ’s finished work. Rehearse God’s promises, not your fears. Name the worry, hand it to the Lord in prayer, and take one faithful step today. Let trusted believers encourage you, and keep lifting your eyes to the God of hope.
prayer: God of hope, fill me with joy and peace in believing. Anchor my soul in Christ so I may abound in hope by the Holy Spirit. Amen.
